item.title: "X affects Y". What does that even mean?
item.description: On my last post I gave an intuitive demonstration of what’s causal inference and how it’s different than classic ML. After receiving some feedback I realize that while the post was easy to digest, some confusion remains. In this post I’ll delve a bit deeper into what the “causal” in Causal Inference actually means. Analyzing the effect of X on Y The field of Causal inference deals with the question of “How does X affect Y?
